introduction: A day in the life of a drug addict in the Bucharest ghetto. The film was part of the research for “Rocker” – Marian Crisan’s second film.The film shows a day in the life of Tudor Sisu , singer of the band La Familia has been twice in jail. Arrested in 2003 for drug trafficking and possession of drugs for personal use , was released in 2005 , as in 2006 to be arrested again . Released in November 2007 , is now in a surveillance program , in the process. Every Monday , he must go to the police station . The documentary presents such Monday from dawn until late at night , starting with a visit to the police station , continuing to work in the studio , where sisu , in great shape , recorded two songs , and ending with his nocturnal adventures , along with a few friends in an apartment in Bucharest, where not missing drugs. A black and white film that does not judge , but looks.A day in " veata " Sisu (La Familia ) , common yet unusual : it's Monday the artist , paroled from prison , must report to the police as to give the undersigned as everything is okay. The documentary is part of the preparation of the first feature film written and directed by Marian Crisan .
